Text: Great gifts deliveredThese gifts send your thoughts across the miles Since Americans everywhere have shared and enjoyed gifts from Harry and David even if they cant be together at the holidays Indeed for many families it just isnt Christmas until their Harry and David gift box arrives This year let us deliver the warmest of holidays for you with gifts like these Through wonderful holiday seasons our Royal Riviera Pears remain Americas most sublime expression of joy and good will We envy anyone their first taste msaspHBXXX No gift stacks up like our original Tower of Treats Luxuriously wrapped stacked and decorated msaspHBXXX If you love fancy cookies but dont have time to bake heres the delicious answer Our tasty Christmas Cookies in a glossy red gift box msaspHBXXX Let us pack and deliver one of our famous Christmas Baskets for your family and friends We guarantee theyll love it and you for sending it Starting at just msaspHBXXX Spending the holidays away from home Our fragrant living Snowbird Tree arrives fully decorated beautifully lit and ready to enjoy on a table desktop or nightstand msaspHBXXX Your friends at Harry and David msaspHBXXX If you would like to change your email address or no longer wish to receive email from us click below muhndhaspershapiroenroncom If you would prefer to see this email in full color click below msaspHBXXX

fmimagesmnetcatcontentharryanddavidxmastxtheadergif Something special happens when people share gifts of fruit and food Thats because fruit and food gifts help bond families and friends on an emotiona l level like no other gifts can Nows a wonderful time to share gifts like these to thank a neighbor to renew a friendship or just to keep in touch Wherever gifts from Harry and David are shared and
